english.segment1: [Kirk Franklin speaking]. Mali, let's go get 'em!
english.segment3: [Mali]. Give me that joy I can't explain. Add extra peace that'll ease my pain. I want that love that'll never change. Give me that, Give me that
english.segment4: Give me that power to walk away. When another god wants to take your place. As much of you as I can take. Give me that, Give me that
english.segment8: [Kirk Franklin speaking]. Ready for his glory
english.segment10: [Kirk Franklin speaking]. If your a seeker for life
english.segment12: [Kirk Franklin speaking]. Let me tell you this story
english.segment14: [Kirk Franklin speaking]. Every place that's dark

english.segment18: [Kirk Franklin speaking]. Hypocritical hearts, back sliders, liers time to get right

english.segment30: [Kirk Franklin speaking]. Through Christ by faith
english.segment32: [Kirk Franklin speaking]. I had to make that choice, I had to open up my mouth and say
english.segment34: Give me that joy I can't explain. Add extra peace that'll ease my pain. I want that love that'll never change. Give me that, Give me that

english.segment62: Give me that power to walk away. When another god wants to take your place. As much of you as I can take. Give me that, Give me that
english.segment65: and I choose you today, cuz i need you today. I cant get away. See, there's no escape. See what you done to me. I'm not the same ol' me. You took away everything. Now you're my everything
english.segment66: [choir sings]. I choose you today, cuz i need you today. I cant get away. See, there's no escape. See what you done to me. I'm not the same ol' me. You took away everything. Now you're my everything
english.segment68: Give me that God that breathes life into nostrils of man. A sovereign god who predestined creation before time began. I want a God who would really add some elegance, decorate the darkness with stars. The God who orchestrates the future, at the same time He knows where you are. Give that God who supplies my needs 'cause he owns all the cattle on the hills. And He's the God that wipes my tears, and provides enough to pay all my bills. Gimmie me that god, that's the God I'm talking bout. Gimmie me that god, that's the God I'm talking bout. Give me that, Give me that. Give me that, Give me that
